title: Digital Media-Based Science Education Competency Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science learning experience and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Conducting digital media production and utilization projects linked to science curricula in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Students can plan and produce explanatory videos on scientific concepts using digital media.
Students can visualize team-based science experiment results as infographics using collaboration tools.
Students can apply strategies to effectively present their digital content in classroom settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
